node.statement: For all monic real-rooted polynomials p, q of degree n with simple roots, defining the finite free Fisher information Phi_n(p) := sum_{i=1}^n H_p(lambda_i)^2 where H_p(lambda_i) = sum_{j != i} 1/(lambda_i - lambda_j), and r = p boxplus_n q is the MSS finite free additive convolution, we have: 1/Phi_n(r) >= 1/Phi_n(p) + 1/Phi_n(q).
